title: In the event of change of ownership, eBay will require the new entity follow their Privacy Notice.

tosdr.case: [Good]  In the event of change of ownership, eBay will require that the new entity follow their Privacy Notice with respect to your personal information.-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Good]  In the event of change of ownership, eBay will require that the new entity follow their Privacy Notice with respect to your personal information.  Should your personal information be used for other purposes not covered, you will receive prior notification of the new process.
